data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Serangium Blackburn (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Xing-Min, Ren, Shun-Xiang, Chen, Xiao-Sheng (2011): A review of the genus Serangium Blackburn (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae) from China. ZooKeys 134: 33-63, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.134.1715, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.134.1715
